name: Walk the Dot
description:
Walk the Dot is a fun puzzle game made in CENTRIA x ECC Game Jam 2021!

Walk your stickman in the snow (use WASD) to find the missing dots joining for creation of the right pattern – and reveal the mysterious photosurprise.

"Connect the dots puzzle we did with pen and paper during childhood."

____________________________________________________________________________
